Question: Foshan Kuroku Electronics Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Foshan Kuroku Electronics Co.,Ltd

Product: CES 2024 Highlight

- Main products: Car Jump Starter, LCD projector, Car Vacuum Cleaner
- Established in 2013, specializing in hi-tech industrial and LED automotive products
- Independent R&D and marketing departments
- Factory recognized by CE/RoHs
- Exhibiting at CES 2024, booth Westgate - 413
- Date: 2024/01/09-- 2024/01/12
- Location: 3150 Paradise Road Las Vegas, NV89109 USA
